DOC.criteria: Be Caucasian African American 2165 year age Be healthy free major illness Be nonsmoker Have intact gallbladder Have TG < 150 blood pressure le 130/90 Must willing recontacted future study Not : myocardial infarction , vascular surgery stroke within past year Not take niacin , 100 mg aspirin/day montelukast allergy medication BMI equal great 30 less 19 Fasting glucose great 125 mg/dl Pregnancy
